summary: 获取指定地域下全部应用监控任务的列表。

schema.description: 资源组ID，您可以通过**资源管理**控制台获取。

报警规则关联应用的类型：

- `TRACE`：应用监控。
- `EBPF`：eBPF监控。

Code.description:
接口状态码：

- `2XX`：成功
- `3XX`：重定向
- `4XX`：请求错误
- `5XX`：服务器错误

Message.description: 请求参数错误时返回的信息。
Message.example: Internal error. Please try again. Contact the DingTalk service account if the issue persists after multiple retries.

Success.description:
操作是否成功：

- `true`：操作成功
- `false`：操作失败

TraceApps.description: 返回的应用监控列表信息。

Type.description:
监控任务类型：

- `TRACE`：应用监控
- `RETCODE`：前端监控

UpdateTime.description: 更新时间的时间戳，单位为毫秒。

Show.description:
ARMS控制台是否显示该应用：

- `true`：显示
- `false`：不显示

CreateTime.description: 创建时间的时间戳，单位为毫秒。

responseDemo: [{"type":"json","example":"{ "Code": 200, "Message": "Internal error. Please try again. Contact the DingTalk service account if the issue persists after multiple retries.", "RequestId": "40B10E04-81E8-4643-970D-F1B38F2E****", "Success": true, "TraceApps": [ { "Type": "TRACE", "AppName": "test-app", "UpdateTime": 1529667762000, "Show": true, "CreateTime": 1529667762000, "Pid": "a5f9bdeb-2627-4dbe-9247-****", "AppId": 123, "UserId": "113197164949****", "RegionId": "cn-hangzhou", "Labels": [ "prod" ], "Tags": [ { "Key": "TestKey", "Value": "TestValue" } ], "ResourceGroupId": "rg-acfmxyexli2****", "Source": "ACK", "WorkloadName": "nginx-deployment ", "WorkloadKind": "Deployment", "Namespace": "default", "ClusterId": "cc7a37ee31aea4ed1a059eff8034b****", "Language": "PHP" } ] }","errorExample":""},{"type":"xml","example":" TRACE 123 113197164949**** 1571865746000 1571865746000 a5f9bdeb-2627-4dbe-9247-**** true cn-hangzhou test-app TRACE 234 113197164949**** 1572401289000 1572401289000 be1f9a33-9c8e-445e-9115-**** true cn-hangzhou test-app2 TRACE 345 113197164949**** 1576338375000 1576338375000 e04391e2-a7e0-4fbe-9987**** true cn-hangzhou test-app3 40B10E04-81E8-4643-970D-F1B38F2E**** 200 true ","errorExample":""}]
title: 获取指定地域下全部应用监控任务的列表
